subject: Re: New submission on Collected Forms "#gform_2"
preview: Hi Annette,  Confirming we have updated the hubspot sync.  Regarding the forms we have updated the notifications to info@performhr.com.au, carol@performhr.com.au

full_threads.body:
Hi Annette,

Confirming we have updated the hubspot sync.

Regarding the forms we have updated the notifications to info@performhr.com.au, carol@performhr.com.au

Hello Joel,

Thank you for your email, yes a lovely break, hope you had a great break too.

Yes, pls turn off the Hubspot Notifications Sync.

Let us know what you go with the notification settings for Carol@perform and Info@perform

Cheers

Annette Tesoriero​​​​

General Manager Marketing

1300 406 005

Hi Annette,

I hope everyone enjoyed a quick break :)

We are looking into this, we have updated both form notification settings (info@performhr.com.au, carol@performhr.com.au will be notified)

Regarding Hubspot Notification Sync, would you like to turn this off?
Hi @joel I already made the updates on the forms to send the notification to carol@performhr.com.au. However I am not sure how to check the spam they are receiving.

Hi Annette,

Happy Easter to you and the family.

I've just asked WOLFIQ to triple check to ensure you/Carol are both
receiving the automated emails on submission (which should be, but no harm
in checking).

Thanks,
Dimitri

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

Thank you in advance
